entry.summary: CQN today concludes its EXCLUSIVE five-part series reflecting on the most infamous games involving Celtic – the brutal, sickening Intercontinental Cup Final clashes with the thugs of Argentina’s Racing Club who masqueraded as footballers. entry.title: HEARTS v CELTIC: 5-MINUTE QUIZ
entry.summary: CELTIC sealed their second successive Premiership title with a 2-0 win over Hearts at Tynecastle on May 7 this year. The Hoops wrapped up their eleventh championship in 12 years with four games remaining. Ange Postecoglou’s last hurrah came in the 3-1 triumph over Inverness Caley Thistle in the Scottish Cup Final at Hampden on June [...]
